subject: As a user I want to be able to upload an image of a set of notes so that I can see my note in the application
As a user I want to be able to tag my notes so that  all my notes are under the correct module
As a user I want to be able to add information about the notes so that I can reference them in the future
As a user I want to be able to save a note, so that I can find it again later
As a user I want to be able to search for a given module, so that I can find all notes for that module
As a user I want to be able to sign in via google sign in
As a user I want to use Tesseract OCR so that I can identify characters
As a user I want to be able to view the application on a website
As the customer I want to see the image being binarised properly
As a developer I need to train my handwriting, so that Tesseract can recognise my handwriting
As a user I want to be able to edit the meta data, so that I can update it in light of a change
As a user I want to be able to remove a note incase I do not want it to appear
As a developer I want to the website to have good styling
As a developer I want to integrate tesseract into the application, so it can read information from a note
As a user I want to be able to view all the notes I have as a user so I can easily find all of them again
As a user I want to view a list of events on the homepage from my calendar, so I can see recent events
As a user I want to be able to save the URL in the calendars event
As a user I want to be able to tag the title of the lecture, so that I can know which one it is.
As a user, when I authorise I want to show my email address and remove the authorise button, so I know I have signed in
As a developer I want to be able to get the date taken from EXIF data, to show informaiton about a note
As a user I want to be able to edit the date and update my calendar
As a developer I want to be able to associate a note with a user
As a user, I want to be able to have automated suggestion of meta data from the image, so that I can know what to tag.
As a user, I want to be able to logout, so that I can close my session
As a user I want to be able to click Tesseract Items, so that it's easier for me to put in the fields.
As a user I want to be able to edit and save to reoccurring events
